document_data.mainbody:
room Boy Tigrellpie was a duergar from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Broom Boy wore a simple set of chainmail armor.
In the , Broom Boy Tigrellpie, along with other duergar, giant spiders, and drow, was slaughtered in the basement cave under the home of Bloomridge Park groundskeeper, Lavernica. Tigrellpies body was left charred and burned by flames near the mutilated body of Incontinentia Figgin, who was turned into a grim effigy by Orin the Red and her Murder Tribunal of Bhaal.
